description: The is a vocabulary learning task with several questions.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You are reviewing two reports about the same event, but you notice that some details don't match. How would you describe this situation?
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: There was a discrepancy between the two reports, as one mentioned 50 attendees while the other stated 70.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You are part of a school project team, and your teacher has asked you to ensure smooth communication between your team and the school administration. Describe your role in this situation.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: I will liaise with the school administration to share updates about our project and address any concerns they might have.
